raw: New Jersey Rate of Virus Increases Is Diminishing, Governor Says .

raw: ( Bloomberg ) -- New Jersey Governor Phil Murphy said the rate of increase in new coronavirus cases is slowing but that it may be an “ imperfect ” measurement because the state is testing only people who are showing symptoms .

raw: New Jersey has the second - highest number of virus cases after New York , with 18,696 positives and 267 deaths as of March 31 .
